name: Nia Moyo
description: Nia Moyo, a 67-year-old retired engineer from East Africa, has extensive technical knowledge and experience in various systems. Despite limited mobility, she possesses a strong analytical mindset and is driven by the urgency of finding a caregiver for her aging friend who requires assistance, reflecting her impulsive decision style while remaining adaptable in mixed social settings.
